title: 请进来看一下服务器为什么不可以开，
txt_content:
是这样的24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeVersion$1.run(ForgeVersion.java:90)24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
24.08 13:14:13 [Server] WARN java.net.UnknownHostException: files.minecraftforge.net
              山能告诉我怎么回事啊，一直卡在哪里，等了好久了！

replies.author: syc123
replies.txt_content: 尝试换一个稳定版的bukkit。  还有bukkit出1.8啦？

replies.author: Helloway
replies.txt_content: 错误报告里写的不是JAVA就是forge。。你装mod了吗？

Helloway 发表于 2015-8-24 14:55
错误报告里写的不是JAVA就是forge。。你装mod了吗？
工业，后来删了还是这样

replies.author: Helloway
replies.txt_content: 你是JAVA8，mc版本是1.8后，则1.8后的forge不支持JAVA8

replies.author: Helloway
replies.txt_content: 如果你现在装的是JAVA8，然而你用的是1.7.10或1.7.2就可能崩溃，所以换1.8的服务器应该就不会有问题了
